content.raw:
I just tested this with two zephyrs. There's one issue of cross talk between the IMUs of the different models because the imu_sensor logic misses. 
```
[Wrn] [ArduPilotPlugin.cc:580] imu_sensor scoped name [default::zephyr_delta_wing_ardupilot_demo::imu_sensor] not found, trying unscoped name.

[Err] [ArduPilotPlugin.cc:593] imu_sensor found [default::zephyr_delta_wing_ardupilot_demo::zephyr_delta_wing_ardupilot_demo::zephyr_delta_wing::wing::imu_sensor][Err] [ArduPilotPlugin.cc:594] world is default[Err] [ArduPilotPlugin.cc:595] model is zephyr_delta_wing_ardupilot_demo
```
From this logic: https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/branch/ardupilot#Lplugins/ArduPilotPlugin.ccT569 (I added a few more debug outputs)

Changing the IMU sensor name to be: `<imuName>zephyr_delta_wing_ardupilot_demo::zephyr_delta_wing::wing::imu_sensor</imuName>` allowed it to work. 

It looks like this is consistent with the iris sensor name: #!/osrf/gazebo_models/pull-requests/221/zephyr_demos/diff#Liris_with_standoffs_demo/model.sdfF517T520

Here's the video: https://youtu.be/l472ppiIvXc

Changing the IMU sensor name to be: <imuName>zephyr_delta_wing_ardupilot_demo::zephyr_delta_wing::wing::imu_sensor</imuName> allowed it to work.

It looks like this is consistent with the iris sensor name: #!/osrf/gazebo_models/pull-requests/221/zephyr_demos/diff#Liris_with_standoffs_demo/model.sdfF517T520
